website_summaries.verdict: A classic red 8.5" diameter kickball with a tacky surface for easier catching finds a good home in the yard or playground.
pros: Works great for all kinds of playground games at school or at home
Plays well on many surfaces – cement or asphalt
cons: Loses air over time – requires re-inflation

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the reviews, these balls are lopsided.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these for Christmas 2017. By March 2018 all 6 balls were extremely lopsided and useless for any game that requires a straight bounce. My kids love playing wall ball and these balls couldn't even handle that after gentle usage after a month. Thinking this may have been a one time defect I bought a second set in March 2018. Same exact story, did one ball at a time to try and make them last longer. Didn't even go to the full 1.5 lbs inflation before I noticed the first ball in this second batch was lopsided straight from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Every last one of them cracked and leaked air within a couple weeks. These were bought at the beginning of spring so they were not exposed to extreme cold or hot temperatures either. You can’t patch them because they are textured. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Massey

customer_reviews.title: Less than 3 months old and several are already beginning ...
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months old and several are already beginning to come apart. My kids are indoor computer gamers and rarely even go outside much less play with these on a regular basis. They get their fair share, don't get me wrong, but not nearly enough to justify the degradation and wear showing in this set of balls. Though I would not buy again, I am giving 3 stars because when the children DO play with these they have an absolute ball (pun intended)..
customer_reviews.author: Seth and Kim

customer_reviews.title: Like the playground balls of yesteryears.
customer_reviews.text: Update: DIDN’T last 2 months. There are small fissures everywhere in these where it appears that they’ve cracked. All but 1 have had to be thrown out. Sadly, didn’t live up to the initial impressiveness. These are great! Colors are nice and bright, rubber is super sturdy feeling. They were a breeze to inflate and are holding up well even after a few months. The fact that they come and such a large set and with a bag makes them well worth the price-which is extremely reasonable. My kids jump around with these in their trampoline and HAVE A BALL WITH THEM! (Pun intended 😂)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Needles Included
customer_reviews.text: These balls seem good, although I don’t know how they will hold up long term. I’m giving only three stars because the “pump” is useless since it does NOT include needles. The pump is also very small. I purchased the balls for a medical mission to Honduras, where we provide activities for children while they wait. If we had not checked for needles, we would have arrived with no way to inflate the balls. Be warned!
customer_reviews.author: constantreader

customer_reviews.title: Just as I remember!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected. The balls were exactly as described. We pumped them up with an air compressor (CAREFULLY) as the supplied pump would have taken a LONG time. These remind me of when I was a kid, bouncy, heavy-duty rubber balls perfect for a playground or backyard. Colors are great too! We've only used them for a few weeks, and have kept them inside when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Purple ball got a hole in it the first day the kids played with it
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Goacher

customer_reviews.title: The ball pump does not include the needle you need to actually pump up the balls.
customer_reviews.text: Description says it comes with a ball pump... the tiny plastic ball pump included did not have any attachment to actually pump up the balls... so now I have to go out and buy a ball pump... not cool at all! Make sure you have a ball pump on hand if you want to be able to use these balls.
customer_reviews.author: parapsychick

customer_reviews.title: Great balls! ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🏐
customer_reviews.text: Good Item for the price! Balls came deflated, but a hand pump was provided ( the needle is inside the black handle of the pump) for those that say there is no needle. 10” ball with dodge ball like outer texture. Just the size I needed for our funnel ball game! Came with one of each color and a mesh bag to store them in. Holding up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Yes I’m a real person

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my students to use for the entire school year starting in August. By the end of October all of the balls have either gone flat or are egg shaped. Worst quality playground balls. Save yourself the money and buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Blaha

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Seriously great price for all these balls. They are school-playground style and quality with a net bag to carry them all. The pump that comes with the balls is cheap but adequate. I have to admit that it takes a bit more strength to pump them up all at once than I have. I was pooped after two balls! Bright colors, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucybee

customer_reviews.title: The pump broke first time used
customer_reviews.text: The pump broke after pumping four balls. It is cheap plastic and doesn’t work well at all. The needle broke into the ball during pumping the very first time we used it on the balls. Very frustrating! The balls are durable and good quality. Disappointing I can’t use these today for our school due to the inability to pump two of them up. Should send a couple of plastic needles or a better pump altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri R Snell

customer_reviews.title: Recess!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our children’s classes (they didn’t have anything for recess!!!!) they were a huge hit! The kids actually played during recess!
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Weak Seams
customer_reviews.text: The ball looked great upon in initial inflation. It bounced good and the kids had a lot of fun with it. After about 2 weeks one of my kids asked me to add air to the ball and after trying to use a little hand pump I heard the leak. I turned to my small air compressor. As soon as I added a spurt of air I heard and then found the leak which was on a seam. The ball still looks good but is useless for it's intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A. Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got these balls so that when the grands visit they can each choose a ball. The net bag is great as I keep them in the bag outdoors while not in use. I have inflated them once about a month and they hold the inflate. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Just what my son was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It came inflated and ready to play with right out of the box. It is the same size (8.5") as school playground balls and my son has been playing with it (inside :( and outside on the pavement) for several days with no problems or complaints .
customer_reviews.author: E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Kids love balls, I had bought these for my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love balls, I had bought these for my kids day care and they are still operational after 6 months with a ton of kids playing with these. Do not expect them to last too much longer though - especially if you are going to leave them out in the weather (sun / rain)
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and leaked
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great at first- perfect size and great playground type balls. But within a few weeks they all cracked and leaked. Would no longer hold air. Was able to return, thankfully. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seem really durable, like commercial grade/playground quality. Cons: They didn't send the needle, so I had to buy one. And the pump would probably get it done, but...
customer_reviews.author: Swede

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use for kick ball.
customer_reviews.text: The colors set my class set apart from the other playground balls at school. Unfortunately, a student popped one only after having them a week. The others seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of playground balls. Ours all inflated perfectly, and it's great to have so many colors, as well as a nice bag to keep them together! The pump is pretty cheap, but you can use one you already have, or a bicycle pump.
customer_reviews.author: JMc

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product, the quality is very poor. I received a box with only the ball, the inflator was missing. Once you inflate the ball it will shape like an egg.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: The ball has just the right amount of bounce and is easy to hold. It's also very bright and easy to spot. Great for dodgeball. My kids can't get enough. Hope that it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Tchibova

customer_reviews.title: nice design
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice ball. my son really likes the design and chooses this ball over other balls in the bag. It lasted 8 months before a kick into a tree resulted in a branch poking a hole in it that couldn't be repaired. But other balls don't seem to fare much better. So I'll order another and see how that works out.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and she has used it EVERY DAY for months now!! It's held up really well. The design shows the love she has given it ;) but she loves it soooooo much she's not worried about the colors fading. You can tell it's been the ball of choice at school with the kids during recess...yet it still bounces like new!
customer_reviews.author: giggles

customer_reviews.title: Great ball from 2016.
customer_reviews.text: One issue to watch out for is manufacturers/sellers changing suppliers and the product changing over time. Meaning, reviews from 4 years ago may or may not apply to the product as currently sold. That said, this ball (which we bought in 2016) has been GREAT for four-square and has been durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Our high bounce old school dodgeballs
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them, plenty so no one is fighting for them. The little pump will give you a workout and keep handy because you often need to give them a shot of air after they have sat for a few days. Reminds me of the dodge balls of old. Very nice bounce.
customer_reviews.author: TexasRD

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a sturdy, well-built ball. It lasted for only a couple uses before it began to leak air and go flat constantly. I'm bummed because the reviews seemed so good! My kids weren't very hard on the ball, and it hardly got any use before it became useless.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sumey

customer_reviews.title: Great General Purpose Balls
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for yard games - they are very sturdy and not cheap feeling. I like that they come with a bag to carry and store in.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I bought these to use in a coin op basketball game thinking that they would make less noise than the heavy basketballs. They worked for that purpose but we ended up moving the game and went back to regular basketballs. I will save them for summer for the grandkids. Appeared well made
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: These are your typical dodge ball balls from elementary school 30 years ago. They don’t fair well with rose bushes but great for kick ball and four square. We’ve managed to steer clear of the rose bushes for over a month now ;)
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Some were damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets (12 balls) and 3 of the balls arrived damaged (cut/scraped/poked/warped). But, those that weren't damaged are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Came without a needle
customer_reviews.text: Came without a needle so couldn't inflate which makes things impossible since we are stuck at home due to virus.
customer_reviews.author: delacube

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved his bag of balls - just like at school.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these balls for my seven year old nephew. He loved his bag of balls. When he opened the gift his first comment was .... this is like what we have at school. The balls come deflated so I did ended up spending part of Christmas day pumping up playground balls.
customer_reviews.author: PatO2098

customer_reviews.title: Every kid should have a good old solid playground ball
customer_reviews.text: Every kid should have a good old solid playground ball, and this one is awesome. Gifted it to a couple of children already and they really liked it. Sometimes the very best gifts for kids are the basics, and this one is basic but with an eye-catching design.
customer_reviews.author: Scamp2

customer_reviews.title: Not round, poor quality, waste of $.
customer_reviews.text: I inflated the ball to the recommended psi and it's not round. It's a big American flag egg made of cheap Chinese rubber. There are stress cracks on it already (took it out of the box about 2 hours ago). The rubber is really thin and doesn't look like it'll last more than a couple months. Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P. Church

customer_reviews.title: Dodge a wrench first, then buy this
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Awesome deal. Comes with the pump and the bag. We had hours of fun playing dodgeball for a work event. The balls hold up well and we will hopefully use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Playground Balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my child's 4th grade class at school. They held up very nice and the kids enjoyed them all year. The teacher will be able to use them again the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for playground balls. I donated these to my daughter’s class and they have held up well. The value was a lot better than even the school could get them for through one of their PE supply vendors.
customer_reviews.author: SCMMama

customer_reviews.title: Defective ball in set; customer support won't call me back
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for my daughter's class. One ball in the set was defective and did not inflate properly. I contacted Franklin via email and phone to see if we could receive one replacement ball, but I am unable to get customer service to respond. If you receive a defective ball in the set of six, you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Whatever happened to the gym class balls that lasted forever?
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was great. The kids appeared to love the thing. It was perfect for 4-square, kick ball, and whatever they felt like using it for. But it lasted less than two months. It was used a lot, daily, but not for anything that such a ball shouldn't be used. Pretty disappointed in the lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Send back to China
customer_reviews.text: Would give them zero on everything if that was an option. Ball’s didn’t last but a couple of times out of the bag. Cracked and leaked air. Cheap Chinese made junk.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.

customer_reviews.title: Will not be ordering these again...
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses and within 2 weeks all but 2 have cracks and and leaked...
customer_reviews.author: kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Durable and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are a great buy. I just wish they didn’t mis-shape so easily when a tiny bit over inflated. However, I use them on a playground with many kids and they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and exactly what I expected. Perfect ball for 4square, kickball, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Incomplete still waiting for the missing part to inflate the balls
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Granados

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We use with the youth at church and they have survived the rough handling of a bunch of teens for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Great for dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: Still holding air after 2 months and many hours of dodgeball and kickball. The bag holds all 13 of my dodgeballs
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The balls are just what I expected but, the pump that came with them is AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Browning

customer_reviews.title: Deflated...Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife's preschool. One came with a pin size hole. Three others have already deflated with small holes. The quality and durability are lacking. I should have read more reviews. We have a tight budget - this purchase certainly did us no favors.
customer_reviews.author: FC2C

customer_reviews.title: quarantine buy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to get my kids playing outside, so I found this great bag of playground balls. Comes with a mesh bag to store them and a pump to fill them. I'm happy to report my diabolical plan is working. Love it and kids have been playing nonstop.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Ammons

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These were terrible, they all went flat within 6 weeks of getting them! DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Helget

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and my grand-kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: Many uses for these balls. They are durable and my grand-kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for helping children learn eye-hand coordination, and a fun ball to kick around the yard. I would recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bad order! One ball already had a hole in it and the pump didn’t come with the needle attachment to inflate them so we had to buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: KVal

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, and ready to go.
customer_reviews.text: Everything a playground ball should be, including arriving g already inflated for which I was grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Get holes easily
customer_reviews.text: Thankful we have six balls as the first two we purchase deflated after getting tiny pokes from being kicked into a bush. Do not use near bushes, sticks or trees where they could easily get punctured.
customer_reviews.author: LEP

customer_reviews.title: came inflated
customer_reviews.text: definitely happy with these. Not the lowest cost, but know they are the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Two of the balls have gone completely flat within 3.5 months. Do not hold air any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one that we have bought. First one went ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one that we have bought. First one went flat in one day. The 2nd one arrived and it had a hole/leak in it. We did not go through the effort to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: runnergirl

customer_reviews.title: Well made ball for the backyard!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves American flags and this seems like it's a great quality so it should last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2myluvs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Better to go to Walmart. Mine came with a plastic pump no needle. Very disappointed. Will return this item if I can’t find another pump. Plastic pup is a joke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recess equipment
customer_reviews.text: I use this equipment for recess for my fourth grade students they love it at the pump is easy to use in the balls stay fully inflated with water again.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Mckoy

customer_reviews.title: NOT ROUND!
customer_reviews.text: These balls do not hold their shape. Within a week, most were lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Playground balls were requested by my 9 yr old granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Playground balls were requested by my 9 yr old granddaughter. 6 weeks later all balls intact with daily use
customer_reviews.author: Karen Holloway

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kids to play kickball with. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: karen willett

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love. Perfect for a two year old or a traditional kickball game every Fourth of July.
customer_reviews.author: ALinz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My GCs really liked this set,They had been using random balls, so this was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: steppin vouf

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on fairly durable balls...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, but be careful when pumping as I made a hole in one of the balls
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mehringer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived inflated which was nice. Perfect for kickball, foursquare, etc.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball! It's nice and thick just like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball! It's nice and thick just like the ones I played with as a kid. This one can hold its own for rowdy kids or kickball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost air
customer_reviews.text: Lost air after a few days. Time for a quality ball
customer_reviews.author: Kim J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bright and colorful for the children . plenty to share
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy!
customer_reviews.text: The balls lasted 2 weeks. They all had holes and had cracked within such a short time. Our kids loved the balls while they lasted, but we are very displeased with the durability and sturdiness of the balls.
customer_reviews.author: justis

customer_reviews.title: Still taking member ship fee . But not getting the service
customer_reviews.text: If I’m paying for prime what happened to the 2 day shipping ? I understand about covid19 . It ain’t stopping y’all from pulling that membership fee out . But not getting the service we paying for
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to inflate, great bag for transporting or storage.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: MY SON LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: THESE BALLS ARE MADE FROM VERY GOOD QUALITY MATERIALS. THICK, SOLID AND GIVE YOU A SENSE THEY WILL LAST A LONG TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a 4th of July birthday and my son loved his new kickball
customer_reviews.author: Joel Langseth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: PreK kids loved it but the inflation did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cooke

customer_reviews.title: It lasted me a long time and could have lasted me longer but my dog decided it would make a nice chew toy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most durable 4-square balls ever! It lasted me a long time and could have lasted me longer but my dog decided it would make a nice chew toy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stover

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Shipped quickly. However, we used our own pump as with the one provided the airflow was really slow.
customer_reviews.author: Reynolds family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. Inflated with difficulty. Good product and happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Doshi

customer_reviews.title: didn't last a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought rubber ball for outdoor play. The ball had a hole within a month of use. not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better pump
customer_reviews.text: Received a small plastic pump with no attachment to blow up the balls. Was easier to just go buy a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and dogs
customer_reviews.text: Worth buying semi in bulk and saving money. Great for kids and dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick and ball works like it should. Design is great :)
customer_reviews.author: budgirl

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long
customer_reviews.text: We have had these balls for 6 months and they no longer inflate and keep air. Not long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L Brunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for play just not for my terrier who punched ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for play just not for my terrier who punched a hole in exterior so as long as you keep it away from dogs, PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: make sure that you send everything that is suppose to come with it
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good only problem did not receive the needle to be able to pump up the balls so having to go purchase a ball pumper.
customer_reviews.author: chrismene bellegarde

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I recieved all of my balls but in the product description I was to recieve a pump and carrying bag. Didnt recieve them how will I pump them up?
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed...we have only had the ball less than a month and it already has a hole with a slow leak. Have to keep pumping it up. Only used to play handball.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scheuerman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These balls are easy to inflate and durable. They are keeping my kids busy while home from school!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Demeo

customer_reviews.title: pump came without a tip!
customer_reviews.text: Balls came with a pump but the pump had no tip so there was no way to blow the balls up
customer_reviews.author: found the tip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I ordered for my daughter's class to play with at recess. The class loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grand nephew and his cousins had a great time with these.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton's Mom

customer_reviews.title: You may have to buy a new pump to use the balls.
customer_reviews.text: The pump was broken so we are not able to blow up any of the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my two year old. It has a good bounce to it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia G

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Item didn’t come. I got heavy bocce balls I don’t want to pay for to return. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McCaffery

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Nice bag and pump. Needs a pump needle tho.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Rubber cracked quickly
customer_reviews.text: Rubber cracked after being in the sun for a couple days. Complete waste of money. Looked and bounced great until it cracked.
customer_reviews.author: PetMum

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Playground Balls - Rubber Kickballs and Playground Balls For Kids - Great for Dodgeball, Kickball, and Schoolyard Games – 8.5” Diameter
feature_bullets: CLASSIC RUBBER PLAYGROUND BALLS: This is the classic playground ball you know and love! These playground balls are perfect for indoor gymnasium games and outdoor play
DURABLE RUBBER CONSTRUCTION: Made from durable rubber, these balls have an excellent bounce and superior toughness which make them perfect for kickball, dodgeball , or any other playground game
EASY GRIP PATTERN: The cross hatch pattern etched on the rubber surface makes the balls easy to grip and hold on to, even for smaller hands!
CARRY BAG AND PUMP INCLUDED: These bulk sets come complete with an inflation pump and needle set as well as a convenient mesh carry bag that makes transportation and maintenance a breeze!
MULTICOLORED: Available in a variety of colors so everyone can have their favorite!
